title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 401 - Licensed Lenders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 401 - Licensed Lenders

State Regulations
§ 401.1 - Application procedure; licenses
§ 401.2 - Application for acquisition of control of licensed lender by purchase of stock, merger, consolidation, purchase of assets or otherwise
§ 401.3 - Changes in directors or officers
§ 401.4 - Change of location
§ 401.5 - Loans, books and records
§ 401.6 - Place of business; conduct of business
§ 401.7 - Purchase and collection of loans made in other jurisdictions
§ 401.8 - Advertising
§ 401.9 - Insurance
§ 401.10 - Computation of interest or charges
§ 401.11 - Authorization for the conduct of other business
§ 401.12 - Filing of rate charts and loan forms

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 401

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 12, 359, 360

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
